extendedIngredients.name: chicken breast
extendedIngredients.originalString: 4 Chicken breast, trimmed and cut into 1" cubes

extendedIngredients.name: red bell peppers
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 large red bell peppers, seeded and cut into 1" squares

extendedIngredients.name: yellow onion
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 large sweet yellow onion, cut into 1" squares

title: Grilled Chicken Gyros

winePairing.pairingText: Agiorgitiko, Moschofilero, and Assyrtiko are my top picks for Gyros. If you feel like going Greek with your Greek food, assyrtiko and moschofilero are both lovely white wines to pair with chicken, seafood, etc. Agiorgitiko is a full bodied red suitable for roasted meats and lamb. The Boutari Moschofilero with a 4 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 14 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Boutari Moschofilero
productMatches.description: Boutari Moschofilero (mo-sko-FEEL-ero) is a premium white wine made from 100% Moschofilero grapes grown in high elevation vineyards in the AOC region of Mantinia in the Peloponnese.For years Boutari Moschofilero has been an important selling white wine in Greece and, until recently, a virtual unknown in the United States. The Boutari winery's vinification of Moschofilero is a breakthrough for Greek wines...and it just might be the start of the next white wine revolution! This is a fresh white wine with intense floral (white rose) and fruity (melon and citrus trees) aromas.

instructions: Clean and diced chicken then place in a large ziploc bag. Add seasoning, garlic, and olive oil to the bag. Seal, toss to coat chicken, and refrigerate for 1 hour.Skewer chicken, peppers, and onions and grill until chicken is cooked through. Approx. 10-15 minutes

steps.step: Clean and diced chicken then place in a large ziploc bag.

Add seasoning, garlic, and olive oil to the bag. Seal, toss to coat chicken, and refrigerate for 1 hour.Skewer chicken, peppers, and onions and grill until chicken is cooked through. Approx. 10-15 minutes
